name: Neurocrawl
description:
Made in a week for 7 Day Roguelike 2020.

You can try to reach γ=7 if you wanna play around with the single mechanic that's in here. It should be possible on most runs, but not guaranteed, and it's possible to get stuck.

This is mostly a barebones tech demo and a failed 7DRL. Early gameplay ideas didn't work out, and between that and a series of migraines, I didn't manage to create anything worthwhile during the timeframe.

See you next year!
